home.title: Welcome!
home.description: We offer moderation tool for all types of content - text, images, video and audio. Secure your online platform with ease using our efficient and flexible system. Join us today and create a space free of unwanted content!

register.title: Register
register.description: Enter your information to create an account

diffLang.title: Different Languages
diffLang.description: Regardless of the language of discussion or publication, our system is able to effectively analyse content and ensure a high level of moderation

varietyFormats.title: Variety of Formats
varietyFormats.description: Whether it's text messages, images, videos or audio recordings, our platform providescomprehensive moderation, ensuring a safe and enjoyable online experience for all users.

integration.title: API Integration
integration.signIn: Please sign in to have access to the API.
integration.available: Serviced available only for users with status Student or better.
